This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard for Windows 7.11.1 + uBO 1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome-extension://cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm/dashboard.html#3p-filters.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I figured I should give a quick headsup that the attempt to add whitelistings in AdGuard Base for `/adservice.` currently aren't working entirely correctly, since uBO would sync List-KR from its own extension settings, instead of while the browser GUI is visiting any of the three `$domain=~` domains.

I see two possible fixes:
*My recommended way:* `@@/adservice.txt?_=` (Appears to work correctly in Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List.) + potentially `@@||adservice.io^$~third-party`?
*An alternative way:* `@@||githubusercontent.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||github.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||adservice.io^`

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/203341738-437ba74e-03fa-48d2-a907-ddff4cf666a0.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard for Windows 7.11.1 + uBO 1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome-extension://cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm/dashboard.html#3p-filters.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I figured I should give a quick headsup that the attempt to add whitelistings in AdGuard Base for `/adservice.` currently aren't working entirely correctly, since uBO would sync List-KR from its own extension settings, instead of while the browser GUI is visiting any of the three `$domain=~` domains.

I see two possible fixes:
*My recommended way:* `@@/adservice.txt?_=` (Appears to work correctly in Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List.) + potentially `@@||adservice.io^$~third-party`?
*An alternative way:* `@@||githubusercontent.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||github.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||adservice.io^`

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/203341738-437ba74e-03fa-48d2-a907-ddff4cf666a0.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

Cannot reproduce, please check @zloyden 

Likely FF extension does not have the cookie rules:
```
tumblr.com#%#AG_onLoad(function(){if(-1===document.cookie.indexOf('euconsent-v2')){var b=new MutationObserver(function(){var a=document.querySelector('.cmp__dialog-footer-buttons > button.components-button.is-primary');a&&a.click()});b.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});setTimeout(function(){b.disconnect()},1E4)}});
tumblr.com#%#//scriptlet('set-cookie-reload', 'logged_in', '1')
```

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard for Windows 7.11.1 + uBO 1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome-extension://cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm/dashboard.html#3p-filters.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I figured I should give a quick headsup that the attempt to add whitelistings in AdGuard Base for `/adservice.` currently aren't working entirely correctly, since uBO would sync List-KR from its own extension settings, instead of while the browser GUI is visiting any of the three `$domain=~` domains.

I see two possible fixes:
*My recommended way:* `@@/adservice.txt?_=` (Appears to work correctly in Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List.) + potentially `@@||adservice.io^$~third-party`?
*An alternative way:* `@@||githubusercontent.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||github.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||adservice.io^`

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/203341738-437ba74e-03fa-48d2-a907-ddff4cf666a0.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@ameshkov 
AdGuardFilters and FiltersRegistry repository does not have `adservice_firstparty.txt` or `adservice.txt` stirng.
I have to create new PR in only HostlistsRegistry[^1] because List-KR uses `!#include` syntax.
[^1]: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/HostlistsRegistry/tree/main/filters/regional

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard for Windows 7.11.1 + uBO 1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome-extension://cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm/dashboard.html#3p-filters.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I figured I should give a quick headsup that the attempt to add whitelistings in AdGuard Base for `/adservice.` currently aren't working entirely correctly, since uBO would sync List-KR from its own extension settings, instead of while the browser GUI is visiting any of the three `$domain=~` domains.

I see two possible fixes:
*My recommended way:* `@@/adservice.txt?_=` (Appears to work correctly in Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List.) + potentially `@@||adservice.io^$~third-party`?
*An alternative way:* `@@||githubusercontent.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||github.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||adservice.io^`

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/203341738-437ba74e-03fa-48d2-a907-ddff4cf666a0.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [X] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/129037
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/66053
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/34198
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/26560
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/123767
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/43932

### Add your comment and screenshots

 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/129037 - Resolved by https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/commit/1498e0076b9c98c2700b5ca778f07673eeb27f18.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/66053 - No such elements are found.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/34198 - UI of the website is changed.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/26560 - The previous rules are useless. Resolved by https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/commit/f6cebd21206091774ef91b2c8b2ff0abb4d900d1.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/123767 - The anti-adblock script cannot be found.

### Terms

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard for Windows 7.11.1 + uBO 1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome-extension://cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm/dashboard.html#3p-filters.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I figured I should give a quick headsup that the attempt to add whitelistings in AdGuard Base for `/adservice.` currently aren't working entirely correctly, since uBO would sync List-KR from its own extension settings, instead of while the browser GUI is visiting any of the three `$domain=~` domains.

I see two possible fixes:
*My recommended way:* `@@/adservice.txt?_=` (Appears to work correctly in Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List.) + potentially `@@||adservice.io^$~third-party`?
*An alternative way:* `@@||githubusercontent.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||github.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||adservice.io^`

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/203341738-437ba74e-03fa-48d2-a907-ddff4cf666a0.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard for Windows 7.11.1 + uBO 1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome-extension://cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm/dashboard.html#3p-filters.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I figured I should give a quick headsup that the attempt to add whitelistings in AdGuard Base for `/adservice.` currently aren't working entirely correctly, since uBO would sync List-KR from its own extension settings, instead of while the browser GUI is visiting any of the three `$domain=~` domains.

I see two possible fixes:
*My recommended way:* `@@/adservice.txt?_=` (Appears to work correctly in Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List.) + potentially `@@||adservice.io^$~third-party`?
*An alternative way:* `@@||githubusercontent.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||github.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||adservice.io^`

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/203341738-437ba74e-03fa-48d2-a907-ddff4cf666a0.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard for Windows 7.11.1 + uBO 1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome-extension://cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm/dashboard.html#3p-filters.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I figured I should give a quick headsup that the attempt to add whitelistings in AdGuard Base for `/adservice.` currently aren't working entirely correctly, since uBO would sync List-KR from its own extension settings, instead of while the browser GUI is visiting any of the three `$domain=~` domains.

I see two possible fixes:
*My recommended way:* `@@/adservice.txt?_=` (Appears to work correctly in Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List.) + potentially `@@||adservice.io^$~third-party`?
*An alternative way:* `@@||githubusercontent.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||github.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||adservice.io^`

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/203341738-437ba74e-03fa-48d2-a907-ddff4cf666a0.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Probably.

comment.body:
К сожалению, мы не можем воспроизвести проблему с вашими настройками.

1. Зайдите, пожалуйста, в настройки > Safari > расширения, отключите все расширения AdGuard и включите снова.
2. Зайдите в приложение AdGuard и обновите фильтры, подождите 2-3 минуты не закрывая приложение.
3. Перезагрузите устройство
4. Зайдите на этот сайт и проверьте наличие рекламы, ее быть не должно.
